education.description: Activities and Societies: 1. Sports secretary of Madan Mohan Malvia Hall 2. Captain of the hall's volleyball team. 3. Engaged in other sports activities throughout the academic term. Abstract of final year thesis titled " HYDRODYNAMIC STUDY OF THE FLOW DUE TO DAM BREAK AROUND RECTANGULAR OBSTACLE" :- During a dam break, the entire valley is affected, according to which bridges, houses, and roads become flow obstacles. The case was simulated by the LSM based CFD program i.e. REEF3D, which solves in compressible RANS equation with k-ω turbulence model and shows free surface in a realistic manner. The CFD model accuracy was checked by comparing result with an experiment… Show more

Although wastewater treatment helps reduce pollution from the environment, thereby reducing negative societal effects, it may have negative impacts on sustainability; for example, waste discharged during treatment.
